data.convo: Mr . Blake ? Mr . Foster ’ s on the phone . He ’ d like to know if you can send over those training manuals ? Oh , tell him I ’ ll leave them at his office tomorrow afternoon . He was hoping that you could drop them off this afternoon . I ’ m afraid that I can ’ t do that . They ’ re at the printer ’ s being copied . They ’ ll be back tomorrow before 1 o ’ clock .
